com.exlibris.dps.sdk.delivery

Class SmartFilePath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.exlibris.dps.sdk.delivery.SmartFilePath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SmartFilePath
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    A better way to access a file: If the storageId & storedEntityIdentifier are present, use them with the StoragePlugin, otherwise use the filePath directly.
    The filePath method is disencouraged, use it only when storageId & storedEntityIdentifier are empty.
    File path may be null if storageId & storedEntityIdentifier are present.
    Author:
    PeterK
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
